content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a court judgment in ljubljana the case involved a divorce between two parties and the judgment was made on june 7 2021 the plaintiff incurred costs of 450929 which the defendant is responsible for paying the court ruled that the real estate property owned by the exspouses should be divided with the plaintiff receiving ¾ and the defendant receiving ¼ the court based its decision on family law principles the court also dismissed the plaintiffs additional claim for a suitable deed for registering their coownership interest the defendant was ordered to reimburse the plaintiffs costs within 15 days the text also explains the process of appealing a judgment including the time limit requirements and consequences for noncompliance
